Text: organizational announcementcase you have not already heard through the extensive grapevine I am indeed leaving the company to take a challenging position in product development for Panamsat the satellite communications company I would like to thank all of you many friends that Im leaving behind at Enron Please stop by and visit when youre in the Northeast Ill be working in Greenwich CT and my permanent email address is All the best Dinos
